actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: Joint resolution to extend the authority for the flexible regulation of interest rates on deposits and share accounts by financial institutions for 60 days.

summary.text: Extends the authority for the regulation of interest rates on deposits and share accounts by financial institutions for sixty days.

titles.title: Joint resolution to extend the authority for the flexible regulation of interest rates on deposits and share accounts by financial institutions for 60 days.
